body_html:
It appears that there is not consistency in these build failures - this time it's a Linux Python 3 failure and Linux CPU failure ( //tensorflow/contrib/rnn:gru_ops_test ); last time Linux CPU failed with a different earlier test (in time out) so perhaps it would have failed gru_ops_test, but Python 3 passed and it was Windows CMake that had to be killed after nearly two hours.

What's the path forward in this situation?
